item.title: Who am I and what is this?
item.description: I’m Chris Beeley and I’m a data scientist. You can find my GitHub here and my team’s GitHub here.
item.content: I’m Chris Beeley and I’m a data scientist. You can find my GitHub here and my team’s GitHub here.

item.title: Intro and welcome
item.description: Hello! This blog is all about my return to the world of Amiga. I have been clicking occasionally on Amiga stuff that I saw in my Twitter feed and was amazed to see that an Amiga print magazine was being launched in the UK. I was an avid user of the Amiga from about 1988 until about 1995.
item.content: Hello! This blog is all about my return to the world of Amiga. I have been clicking occasionally on Amiga stuff that I saw in my Twitter feed and was amazed to see that an Amiga print magazine was being launched in the UK. I was an avid user of the Amiga from about 1988 until about 1995.
